a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per capita: Comparing data from World Bank and Maddison
This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

Maddison Project Database data
(international-$ in 2011 prices)
Data source: World Bank - WDI: GDP per capita, PPP (constant 2011 international $); Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2011 prices.
